description:
It's been sixteen years since The Cure's last album, but a 14th is on its way. "Songs of A Lost World" will be released in November and this is its opening track, "Alone". I'm sorry there's only a fraction of it  here - copyright was an issue - but it's beautiful and all (nearly) seven minutes of "Alone" can be found here:

https://youtu.be/sx9SVAtMkJM?si=LnOFOK4uCuVzWSm9


'Dreams on Toast' - the new Darkness album - is released in March - and we'll be going on tour:  
https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/
https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/officialstore 
Our new single, The Longest Kiss is here:  https://thedarkness.lnk.to/tlk 

To go behind the scenes with me or to join a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen to the archives on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spotify.com/show/0hQYjIww4Rfaka9Fqc11mX?si=ab25
title: The Cure: Beautiful but Dark
